author: Special Correspondent
text:
A three-member Vice Chancellor search panel that will present three names to the Governor for the post of V-C of the Tamil Nadu Open University has been constituted. The former V-C Chandrakantha Jayabalan’s term ended on January 17.

The Governor-Chancellor’s nominee is S. Subbiah, the current Vice Chancellor of Alagappa University of Karaikudi. The Senate nominee is S. Ganesan, registrar of Anna University and the Syndicate nominee is Gunasekaran. Mr. Subbiah took over as V-C in July. Mr. Gunasekaran is the Vice Chancellor of Thiruvalluvar University.
title: TNOU V-C search panel constituted
